titles.title: All Praise to Jesus' Hallowed Name
All Praise to Thee, O Jesus Christ, O Jesus Christ, All Praise to Thee, We Praise You, Jesus at Your Birth, All Praise to Thee, Eternal Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All praise to Jesus' hallowed Name Who of virgin pure became True man for us! The angels sing As the glad news to earth they bring. Hallelujah!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Th'Eternal Father's only Son For a manger leaves His throne Disguised in our poor flesh and blood See now the everlasting Good.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He whom the world could not inwrap Yonder lies in Mary's lap; He is become an infant small, Who by His might upholdeth all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Th'Eternal Light, come down from heav'n, Hath to us new sunshine giv'n; It shineth in the midst of night, And maketh us the sons of light.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: The Father's Son, God ever\blest, In the world became a guest; He leads us from this vale of tears, And makes us in his kingdom heirs.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
He came to earth so mean and poor, Man to pity and restore,
And make us rich in heaven above, Equal with angels through his love.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
All this He did to show His grace To our poor and sinful race;
For this let Christendom adore And praise His name for evermore.
